name: 100MinJam(yes I'm serious)(kinda)
description:
This "game" was made for the 10^2 jam.

Ever played space invaders, and wondered what it would be like to be the aliens?, well here you go.

press the left mouse button in the specified area to deploy your alien!

 (yes I know they were supposed to shoot not walk down.

 what do you mean it's easy to make?

 look it would've been too easy if you can make tons of aliens to just constantly shoot

 ok ok I could've thought this one through but I was panicking ok!)

ahm ahm ignore that.

anyway hope you can enjoy this... oh who the fuck am I kidding, this thing is hardly a prototype, enjoy!, I guess!.
